method.name: load_from_buffer
method.description: This method loads audio data from a PackedByteArray buffer into an AudioStreamOggVorbis object.

method.name: load_from_file
method.description: This method loads audio data from a file into an AudioStreamOggVorbis object. The file path is provided as a string.

members.member: If [code]true[/code], the audio will play again from the specified [member loop_offset] once it is done playing. Useful for ambient sounds and background music.
